channel.title: David Tilson
channel.description: Recent news about David Tilson, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Marketwire (press release)
item.description:
Government of Canada Supports Cloud Security Innovator in Bolton
6, 2013) - The Honourable Gary Goodyear, Minister of State for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario), joined by David Tilson, Member of Parliament for Dufferin-Caledon, announced today that PerspecSys Inc. is receiving support from the Government of Canada to accelerate the development of its cloud security solution. "Support ... "This investment through the Investing in Business Innovation initiative will position PerspecSys Inc. for continued success," said MP Tilson.

item.title: Mentioned by Marketwire (press release)
item.description:
Media Advisory: Government of Canada to Support Business Innovation in ...
BOLTON, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - Sept. 5, 2013) - The Honourable Gary Goodyear, Minister of State for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario), will join David Tilson, Member of Parliament for Dufferin-Caledon, to announce funding to support business innovation in southern Ontario. Minister Goodyear and MP Tilson will participate in a photo opportunity and will be available to answer questions from the media following the event. Please note that all details are subject to ...

item.description:

MP David Tilson announced that she will be guest of honour at the Dufferin-Caledon Conservative Association's Falling into Fashion. This will be a fashion show and dinner fundraiser set for next Thursday (Sept. 12) at the Royal Ambassador Event Centre on ...

item.title: Mentioned by Orangeville Citizen
item.description:
Tilson says proroguing Parliament no big deal
Tilson says proroguing Parliament no big deal. By BILL REA. Caledon Citizen. Prime Minister Stephen Harper's plan to prorogue Parliament raised some eyebrows earlier this week, but Dufferin-Caledon MP David Tilson maintains it is no big deal. Mr. Harper ...

item.title: Mentioned by Orangeville Citizen
item.description:
Tilson pleased with look of new cabinet
There were few surprises for Dufferin- Caledon MP David Tilson in light of Monday's shuffling of the federal cabinet by Prime Minister Stephen Harper. What was being billed as a major adjustment was actually rather minor in nature, with most of the cabinet ...
